scripts.clean:win:
cmd /c "if exist node_modules rmdir /s /q node_modules && if exist packages\server
ode_modules rmdir /s /q packages\server
ode_modules && if exist packages\web
ode_modules rmdir /s /q packages\web
ode_modules && if exist packages\apps
ode_modules rmdir /s /q packages\apps
ode_modules"
scripts.clean:dist: cmd /c "if exist packages\server\dist rmdir /s /q packages\server\dist && if exist packages\web\dist rmdir /s /q packages\web\dist && if exist packages\apps\dist rmdir /s /q packages\apps\dist"
